|Uttar Pradesh
|Fatehpur
|Vandalism / communal tension
|A group of Hindu activists in Abu Nagar, Fatehpur district, Uttar Pradesh, allegedly entered the Eidgah campus and vandalised the 200-year-old mausoleum of Nawab Abdul Samad. Saffron flags were hoisted on the structure and religious slogans were shouted. Local police were reportedly present at the site during the incident.
|Graves damaged; no reported deaths
